ygData.subject: Re: Seeking advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Ilys!!!  Yah, gal, come on around to the rear where all us chicken clerics are!!!  LOL   Survival rate I ve found to be MUCH better!  Heh And what the heck
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Ilys!!! Yah, gal, come on around to the rear where all us chicken
clerics are!!! LOL Survival rate I've found to be MUCH better! Heh

And what the heck you doing on THIS list? A lurking ranger..ACK!!

Come on over and check out the other cleric list I moderate
EQ_Cleric@onelist.com
We have some absolutely terrific clerics over there and have a blast.
Almost have as much fun over there as I have in EQ. I've learned so much
from everyone there it's unreal. And believe me when I tell you there's
never a dull moment. Got some real clowns and cards that keep us in
stitches all the time.

*huge hugs to her guild sister, Ilys*

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: "Ilystil Drakonblayde" <ilystil@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 14, 2000 6:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Seeking advice...


> From: Ilystil Drakonblayde <ilystil@...>
>
> At 12:29 AM 1/14/00 -0500, you wrote:
> >Rose, the dragons' spells are all AoE and will get you even when you
stand
> >out of healing range of your party. I've learned that it makes no
> >difference if I stand on the steps (at Nag) or right behind my tanks in
> >front of the dragon as to damage I take. And you MUST be in healing
range
> >of your party, otherwise why be there? One VERY interesting thing I have
> >discovered tho......on the last two dragon raids I positioned myself
BEHIND
> >the dragon, almost under his/her butt. Guess what....I did not suffer
> >nearly the dmg from their spells I did when I was in front of them yet
was
> >still in healing range of my party. And I never got physically hit,
> >although I rarely do unless I get summoned, then I get clawed big time.
>
> Hrm, maybe I should pretend I'm a rogue and head around to the back. Might
> actually live through Nagafen :)
>
> *waves to Mik* Hiya! :)
>
> =Ilystil Drakonblayde <Emef`Aitch> / The Blade of Tunare
> =Level 50 Lady Ranger of the Rathe / ilystil@...
> ===========================================================
> 'Ye have enemies? Good, good. That means ye've stood up
> for something, sometime in thy life.' - Elminster
